alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County; Mainland Monroe; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 12:56AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Collier, Hendry, northern Broward, Palm Beach and south central Glades Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 1256 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Indiantown to near Devils Garden to Naples. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Boynton Beach, Wellington, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Lake Worth, Riviera Beach, Naples, Belle Glade, Marco Island, Palm Beach, Clewiston, Pahokee, Tequesta, South Bay, Juno Beach, Moore Haven, Chokoloskee, Immokalee and Canal Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
